content.para: Release 3.16.0 includes a number of fixes to make Carrot2 compatible with newer Java revisions (it remains to be backward compatible with Java 1.7+).

td.p: Addressed several incompatibilities with newer Java versions, both at build-level and at runtime. Workbench now works with Java 1.9+.
Workbench bug fixes and workarounds for newer Ubuntu releases, odd characters in installation path and Java 1.9 compatibility.
Updates ETools document source URLs to use HTTPS. Removed Indeed document source (no longer functional)
Added a constructor for the Document class that takes an external ID, making it consistent with Java API Document class.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
